prepare the large guest room, if you please,

hãy chuẩn bị phòng tiếp khách lớn.

Ừ, tất nhiên.

Ah.

-"We should have it appraised." -Appraised.

Have patience, woman.

Necati, go to Şişhane at once.

My God! What's wrong with you?

I'm sorry, but I gotta say it.

pa: Just remember, we have to be out of this house
